name: Beehive Salon
description:
Save the bees and their hair!

A fun little arcade game where you control worker bees to make as much honey as possible

 to supply the Beehive Salon with their secret ingredient for amazing hair gel.

Instructions:

  • Drag and drop bees to treadmills  and conveyor belts to keep the honey supply going.
  • Remember to let them rest when their stamina is low.
  • Press "+" to buy more bees to speed up production.
  • Drag the "UP" arrow to machinery and rest stations to upgrade for optimal efficiency. 

Credits:
